author: fdmanana
msg: For each worker process there's a missing revs finder process.
Therefore we have to account for it when defining the max number
of parallel requests a worker can do, otherwise the processes
waste too much time waiting for connections to become available.

author: doogie
msg: OPTIMIZE: The internal loaderArgs variable is now a list instead of a String

author: doogie
msg: OPTIMIZE: All the fullinit code is no longer inside an if; instead, if fullinit is
not wanted, do an early return.  This causes the code to remove one
